model_explanation.what_it_is: A model that recommends items based on their properties (content). It does not use any user interaction data.
model_explanation.how_it_works:
1. All mobile specs (Brand, OS, Battery, etc.) were combined into a 'soup' of keywords. 
2. TF-IDF was used to find the most important keywords for each phone. 
3. A similarity matrix was built to store a score (0 to 1) of how similar each phone is to every other phone.
model_explanation.what_it_is_used_for: This model is perfect for 'cold-start' users or for a 'Find Similar Items' feature.
model_explanation.example: A user is viewing a 'Realme 7 Pro' (which has 'Android 10' and a 'battery_high'). This model can instantly find the top 10 other phones that *also* have 'Android 10' and a 'battery_high', even if they are from a different brand.
